title: castle
shortDescription: A Grade II listed property with 5 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms, featuring 60-foot castellated walls and a 2,727 sq ft refurbished barn.
fullDescription: Stowe Castle combines period charm with modern amenities, including a contemporary kitchen, luxurious bathrooms, and spacious living areas. The estate includes landscaped gardens, a private helipad, and a large barn offering secondary accommodation. Architectural highlights encompass arches, oak doors, a marble fireplace, and flagstone flooring.

title: snowy home
fullDescription: with 5 rooms 3 bathrooms and kitchen with garage the entire house is apply heating

title: gateway house
fullDescription: 2 master bedrooms 2 small bed rooms a kitchen and a outdoor swimming pool and 2 bathrooms with garage
